title: Tripp Lite Clamp-On Monitor Riser Stand
short_description: Place your monitor above the surface with this Tripp Lite Clamp-On Monitor Riser Stand. It raises your monitor 5 inches above the surface for more comfortable viewing. It has a rectangular 39.4 in. wide platform which supports up to 44lbs weight maximum capacity. Featuring antimicrobial protection, it helps resist the growth of bacteria, viruses, fungi, mold, and mildew.
